page.title: 16A Housewife's Day
page.content: The start of another day! Breakfast to prepare for five of us see husband off to work,three children off to school and then wash the pots. Upstairs next to make beds and tidy the bedrooms,downstairs to dust and vacuum all the rooms. My next job is to wash the clothes and hang them out to dry, pay the coalman and start to prepare dinner for my husband and I. 12noon,time to eat, feed the dog,wash upand then walk to Wykeham to collect shopping. On returning home out to do some gardening.bring in dry washing iron clothes and then start to get tea ready.Children arrive home full of their days activities,husband home. time for tea.Supervision of shoe clean ing,homework,bathtime and bedtime,"Ah, now some time to myself" Sinking into a chair,read,sew,watch T.V.time for bed and the beginning of a new day!
